# web-data-fetching-trpc

tRPC type-safe API patterns, procedures, React Query integration

## Tags

`trpc` `type-safe-api` `react-query` `typescript` `monorepo` `rpc`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["web-data-fetching-trpc"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.
